reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: F.a: Strengthening of CSO Network on Mangrove Conservation in Indonesia

description.narrative: This project strengthens the JANGKAR network of NGOs (established in 2016) on mangrove forest protection and sustainable use, and supports its planning, campaigning and publication work. This project will enlarge the action of the network, improve the exch ange of information among operators and effects on policy makers and other stakeholders for acknowledging the importance of mangrove and for stopping the rapid destruction of mangrove forests. So far the mangrove forests havent get adequate attention from the government of Indonesia, when the concentration has been on the commercial utilization of mangrove. This project aims also to collect information and to draw more general view about the amount of mangrove forest still existing in Indonesia, since the e stimations made by ministries and other operator varies widely. Additionally, this project will support a local working group in east Kalimantar to examine the situation of the mangrove forests in Balikbapan Bay, and the communities that are dependent on these forests. The goal is to influence on local policy makers to enable the protection and sustainable use of mangrove. The key results of the project are different publications, bulletins and a map about East Kalimantan mangrove ecosystem. Expected impa cts are the growing engagement of local government to conserve mangrove, to enable the protection of mangrove in East Kalimantar, as well as strengthening the capacity and campaign work of JANKGAR network. Along with the members of the network, the central stakeholders are ministries of forestry and marine, local governments, indigenous people that are depend on mangrove forests and other local communities/ minor fisheries and the corporations that are threatening the preservation of mangrove forests (suc h as coal mining, pulp and oil plantations, industrial fishing and crab farming and ship transport). http://fwi.or.id
